# secrets

Manage your user secrets

## Usage

```console
coder secrets
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                       | Purpose                  |
|--------------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| [<code>create</code>](./secrets_create.md) | Create a new user secret |
| [<code>list</code>](./secrets_list.md)     | List user secrets        |
| [<code>get</code>](./secrets_get.md)       | Get user secret          |
